item.title: #TIL : Install CA root certificate on iOS device
item.description: Install CA root certificate on iOS device Disclaimer : ⚠️ You can do it, but it’s at your own risk ! Sometimes you want to accept a SSL firewall proxy or self-MITM proxy, the important step is installing its CA root certificate to your device. Because iOS apps almost use all https connections (that’s new rule). This is the way to install and enable custom CA Root cert :
